trans-unit.source: Converts a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture"></xref> object to and from other types.
trans-unit.target: 將轉換<xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture"></xref>物件與其他類型。

trans-unit.source: The MouseGestureConverter class only converts an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> to and from a <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: MouseGestureConverter 類別只會轉換成<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>與<xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String></xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>的執行個體

trans-unit.source: The MouseGestureConverter converts to and from a <xref:System.String> using the "+" character as the delimiter between the modifier keys and the mouse action.
trans-unit.target: MouseGestureConverter 將轉換的<xref:System.String>輔助按鍵和滑鼠動作之間的分隔符號使用的"+"字元。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: For example, the string `Control+RightClick` would be converted into a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> with a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.Modifiers%2A> property equal to <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.MouseAction%2A> property equal to <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，字串`Control+RightClick`會轉換成<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>具有<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.Modifiers%2A>屬性等於<xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys><xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.MouseAction%2A>屬性等於<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction></xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.MouseAction%2A>和</xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys></xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.Modifiers%2A></xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 文字用法

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseGestureConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseGestureConverter"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an object of the specified type can be converted to an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture"></xref>, using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定之類型的物件是否可以轉換的執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture"> </xref>，使用指定的內容。

trans-unit.source: A format context that provides information about the environment from which this converter is being invoked.
trans-unit.target: 這個轉換子就要從中叫用的環境的相關資訊會提供格式內容。

trans-unit.source: The type being evaluated for conversion.
trans-unit.target: 轉換所評估的類型。

trans-unit.target: if sourceType is of type ; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture"></xref> can be converted to the specified type, using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: 判斷執行個體是否<xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture"></xref>可以轉換成指定的型別，並使用指定的內容。

trans-unit.source: A format context that provides information about the environment from which this converter is being invoked.
trans-unit.target: 這個轉換子就要從中叫用的環境的相關資訊會提供格式內容。

trans-unit.target: 轉換所評估的類型。

trans-unit.target: if destinationType is of type ; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: Attempts to convert the specified object to a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture"></xref>, using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試將指定的物件轉換成<xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture"> </xref>，使用指定的內容。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGestureConverter> converts to and from a <xref:System.String> using the "+" key as the delimiter between the modifier keys and the mouse action.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGestureConverter>將轉換的<xref:System.String>輔助按鍵和滑鼠動作之間的分隔符號使用的"+"索引鍵。</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGestureConverter>

trans-unit.source: For example, the string `Control+RightClick` would be converted into a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> with a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.Modifiers%2A> property equal to <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.MouseAction%2A> property equal to <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，字串`Control+RightClick`會轉換成<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>具有<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.Modifiers%2A>屬性等於<xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys><xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.MouseAction%2A>屬性等於<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction></xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.MouseAction%2A>和</xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys></xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.Modifiers%2A></xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>

trans-unit.source: A format context that provides information about the environment from which this converter is being invoked.
trans-unit.target: 這個轉換子就要從中叫用的環境的相關資訊會提供格式內容。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to convert a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture"></xref> to the specified type, using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試轉換<xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture"></xref>為指定的類型，使用指定的內容。

trans-unit.source: `destinationType` must be <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: `destinationType`必須是<xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGestureConverter> converts to and from a <xref:System.String> using the "+" key as the delimiter between the modifier keys and the mouse action.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGestureConverter>將轉換的<xref:System.String>輔助按鍵和滑鼠動作之間的分隔符號使用的"+"索引鍵。</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGestureConverter>

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> with a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.Modifiers%2A> property equal to <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.MouseAction%2A> property equal to <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction> converts to the string `Control+RightClick`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>與<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.Modifiers%2A>屬性等於<xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.MouseAction%2A>屬性等於<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction>將轉換成字串`Control+RightClick`。</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction> </xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.MouseAction%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> </xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.Modifiers%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>
